name: Venomage

skills.name: Toxicity
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Decreases the targets MAX HP by 75% of the damage inflicted if they are under [Heal Reduction] debuff. Each hit has a 35% chance of activating up to two Poison debuffs on the target.

effects.notes: 2 hits total. Damage scales with 2.4x ATK per hit. Damage +10% total when fully booked.
If target is under Heal Reduction debuff, decreases their MAX HP by 75% of damage inflicted. Powerful vs high HP targets in extended fights.
35% chance per hit (50% fully booked) to place 5% Poison debuff. 2 hits = 2 chances. Can place up to 2 Poison debuffs total (one per hit).

skills.book_value: Medium priority - Damage +10%, Poison chance +15% (35%â†’50%), good for CB/FW poison stacking
skills.notes: MAX HP reduction mechanic is unique but situational - requires Heal Reduction on target AND extended fight. Best in Doom Tower boss fights. Poison chance makes this decent for CB if no better poisoners.

skills.name: Neurotoxin
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 75% chance of placing a 60% [Decrease DEF] debuff for 2 turns. Also has a 75% chance of placing a 50% [Decrease ATK] debuff for 2 turns if the target is under a [Poison] debuff.

effects.notes: Heavy nuke with 6x ATK multiplier. Damage +10% when fully booked.
75% chance (100% fully booked) to place 60% Decrease DEF for 2 turns. Chance increases +10% at book 3, +15% at book 4.
75% chance (100% fully booked) to place 50% Decrease ATK for 2 turns. ONLY applies if target is already under Poison debuff. Requires poison first.

skills.book_value: CRITICAL - Must book for 100% debuff chance and 3-turn cooldown (was 4). Decrease DEF essential for team damage.
skills.notes: Strong single-target debuffer. Decrease DEF works unconditionally, but Decrease ATK requires Poison on target first (synergizes with A1/A3). Book to 100% for reliable debuffs.

skills.name: Fleshmelter Venom
skills.description: Attacks all enemies. Has a 75% chance of placing a 100% [Heal Reduction] debuff for 3 turns. Also has a 75% chance of placing two 5% [Poison] debuffs for 2 turns.

effects.notes: AOE nuke with 4x ATK multiplier. Damage +10% when fully booked.
75% chance (100% fully booked) to place 100% Heal Reduction for 3 turns on all enemies. Enables A1 MAX HP reduction mechanic and counters healing bosses.
75% chance (100% fully booked) to place TWO 5% Poison debuffs for 2 turns on all enemies. Strong AOE poison application.

skills.book_value: CRITICAL - Must book for 100% debuff chance and 3-turn cooldown (was 4). Heal Reduction critical for many bosses, poison excellent for CB.
skills.notes: Core ability. Heal Reduction shuts down healing bosses (Scarab, DT bosses, some dungeon bosses). 2x Poison per target makes this strong for CB poison stacking. Book ASAP for 100% proc rate.

skills.name: Pain Writhe [P]
skills.description: Enemies under [Heal Reduction] debuffs inflict 15% less damage.

effects.notes: All enemies with Heal Reduction debuff deal 15% less damage. Passive defensive utility, always active when Heal Reduction is applied.

skills.notes: Provides passive damage mitigation for the team. Synergizes with A3 Heal Reduction. Excellent for survivability in extended boss fights where Heal Reduction is needed anyway.

cheese_strategy.cheese_type: Heal Reduction specialist (Scarab King, DT bosses)
cheese_strategy.cheese_mechanic_info:
Scarab King (DT): Venomage + Poison team. Use A3 to apply Heal Reduction (prevents Scarab from healing shields), then poison him down. Requires high ACC (250+) and survivability.

DT Boss Heal Counter: Many DT bosses have healing mechanics. Venomage A3 shuts down healing entirely with 100% Heal Reduction. Pair with poison damage for boss kills.

CB Poison Stacking: Venomage A3 places 2x Poison debuffs AOE, A1 can place 2 more single-target. With Master Hexer, can maintain high poison uptime. Pairs with Frozen Banshee, Geomancer for max poison.

FW Poison Carry: Lizardmen FW benefits from poison damage and Decrease DEF. Venomage can solo-carry early stages.

mechanics_advisory:
Venomage is a mid-tier Epic support champion with strong Heal Reduction and poison application. Core value:

1. **100% Heal Reduction** (A3) - Shuts down healing bosses (Scarab King, DT bosses, some dungeon bosses). 3-turn duration is excellent.
2. **AOE Poison** (A3) - Places 2x Poison debuffs on all enemies, strong for CB and FW.
3. **Decrease DEF** (A2) - 60% Decrease DEF enables team damage, works unconditionally.
4. **Conditional Decrease ATK** (A2) - Requires target under Poison first, but useful for survivability.
5. **Passive Damage Reduction** - 15% damage reduction when enemies have Heal Reduction. Synergizes with A3.
6. **ACC Aura** - +45 ACC aura for all battles, helpful for early/mid game teams lacking ACC.

**Best Use Cases**:
- **Scarab King (DT)**: Heal Reduction prevents shield healing, poison kills boss.
- **Clan Boss**: Poison stacking (not top tier, but usable if lacking better poisoners like Frozen Banshee).
- **Doom Tower Bosses**: Heal Reduction shuts down healing mechanics on certain bosses.
- **Lizardmen FW**: Poison and Decrease DEF excellent for faction progression.

**Limitations**:
- **Low priority** vs top-tier poisoners (Frozen Banshee, Elenaril, etc.).
- **No TM control** or hard CC, limiting dungeon/arena use.
- **ATK-based scaling** - squishier than DEF-based champions, requires HP%/DEF% investment.
- **Conditional A2 Decrease ATK** - requires poison first, not always reliable.

**Synergies**:
- **CB**: Pairs with Frozen Banshee (more poison), Geomancer (HP Burn), Rhazin (Decrease DEF backup), Skullcrusher (counterattack).
- **DT/Scarab**: Pairs with poison specialists, revive champs (Scyl, Rector Drath), HP Burn (Ninja).
- **FW**: Pairs with Rhazin (Decrease DEF/Weaken), any Lizardmen DPS.

**Booking Priority**: A3 FIRST (100% Heal Reduction/Poison proc + cooldown reduction), then A2 (100% Decrease DEF + cooldown), then A1 (poison chance). Full books recommended for CB/DT use.
